import React from 'react' import {Field , reduxForm} from 'redux-form' import {required , maxLengthCreator} from '../../../utils/validators/validators' import { Textarea } from '../../common/FormsControl/FormsControls' import { MyPosts } from './MyPosts.1' let AddNewPostForm = props => { return
} export let AddNewPostFormRedux = reduxForm({form: "ProfileAddNewPostForm"})(AddNewPostForm) const maxLength10 = maxLengthCreator(30) export default MyPosts;
